key_events: Artie transitioned from the Character Creation Suite to the Whispering Woods.
The System confirmed the [Fragile] status and 1/1 HP cap.
Artie checked his inventory, confirming he still possessed his Leather Wallet and Keyring.
A Level 1 Lesser Forest Slime emerged and aggressively pursued Artie.
Artie backed into an ancient oak tree, becoming cornered by the slime.
Artie drew his Keyring (ITEM_KEYS_001) to use as a weapon.
The slime launched its first attack as Artie dropped into a combat stance.
